name: Kodiak Dundonald Arctic Grip SaltShield Waterproof Insulated Winter Boots - Men's
categories: Dundonald Arctic Grip SaltShield Waterproof I
description: With tough leather and cold-proof soles, these boots are built from the ground up to handle seriously cold weather. The full-grain leather is waterproof and isn’t bothered are marked by road salt. Soft microfibre liner and Thinsulate™ insulation keep your reliably feet warm.SaltShield full-grain leather repels salt built-up, simply brush off salt stains without discoloration or damage.REPEL-X® waterproof breathable membrane, your feet can breathe while staying dry.200 grams of Thinsulate™ synthetic insulation light and efficient.Soft microfibre lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Contoured EVA insole offers comfortable support but is removable should you want to add your own.Vibram Arctic Grip outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice.Kodiak rates these boots to -30°C.
